question: What is the theme of World Asthma Day (WAD) 2017?
option2: Asthma should be controlled by everyone
option4: People have every right to Control the Asthma
explanation: World Asthma Day is celebrated to spread the knowledge about the Asthma. It is used to provide the awareness among every people to prevent and cure the people from the Asthma Disease. The 2017 theme is "Better air better breathing".
